actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 3 Broomsticks 2 Talons or 1 Beak and 1 Talons.

actions.name: Beak (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage and attaches to target. While attached doesn't attack. Instead at start of each of its turns target: 12 (2d8+3) hp to blood loss. Can detach itself via 5 ft. of its move. It does so after target is reduced to 0 hp. Creature including target can use action to detach it via DC 13 Str.

actions.name: Talons (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Broomstick (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.desc: Fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 ft. of it. Target: DC 12 Wis save or charmed 1 min. While charmed creature is incapacitated has speed 0 and refuses to remove attached alabroza. Charmed creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If a creature's save is successful creature immune to this for next 24 hrs.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 12) no material components: At will: minor illusion3/day ea: detect thoughts suggestion

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Transforms into Med humanoid Small mist cloud or back into true bird-like fiend form. Other than size and speed stats are same in each form with mist form exceptions. Items worn/carried not transformed. Reverts on death. Mist form: can't take any actions speak or manipulate objects resistance to nonmagical damage. Weightless fly speed 20' can hover can enter hostile creature's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space mist can with o squeezing but can't pass through water.

special_abilities.name: Bloodthirsty
special_abilities.desc: Must drink 1+ pint of fresh blood or milk every 24 hrs or suffers one level of exhaustion. Each pint it drinks removes one level.
